TunableList.name: BABY_BASSINET_DEFINITION_MAP
TunableList.description: The corresponding mapping for each definition pair of empty bassinet and bassinet with baby inside. The reason we need to have two of definitions is one is deletable and the other one is not.

Tunable.name: Baby
Tunable.description: The definition of an object that is a bassinet containing a fully functioning baby.

Tunable.name: EmptyBassinet
Tunable.description: The definition of an object that is an empty bassinet.

Tunable.name: BABY_CLOTH_STATE
Tunable.description: The object state that determines baby cloth value.

TunableList.name: BABY_CLOTH_STATE_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping from current BABY_CLOTH_STATE value to cloth string.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The state value that will be looked for on the baby.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The cloth that will be used if the state value key is present.

TunableList.name: BABY_DEFAULT_BASSINETS
TunableList.description: A list of trait to default bassinet definitions. This is used when generating default bassinets for specific babies. The list is evaluated in order. Should no element be selected, an entry from BABY_BASSINET_DEFINITION_MAP is selected instead.

TunableTuple.description: Should the baby have any of the specified traits, select a bassinet from the list of bassinets.

TunableList.name: bassinets
TunableList.description: Should this entry be selected, a random bassinet from this list is chosen.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: This entry is selected should the Sim have any of these traits.

TunableTuple.name: BABY_DEFAULT_CLOTH
TunableTuple.description: Tuning for the default cloth value for different babies.

Tunable.name: alien
Tunable.description: The cloth that will be used by default for an alien baby.

Tunable.name: boy
Tunable.description: The cloth that will be used by default for a boy baby.

Tunable.name: girl
Tunable.description: The cloth that will be used by default for a girl baby.

Tunable.name: BABY_THUMBNAIL_DEFINITION
Tunable.description: The thumbnail definition for client use only.
